title: End of Witness (Person of Interest)(1 x 7)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: Carl Elias was one of the most interesting characters ever seen on a TV screen. He was devilish and intriguing at the same time. I really miss POI, my all-time favorite tv show.
Una de las mejores escenas con el perfecto soundback... ME ENCANTA!
It was an amazing scene. along with the song
One of the best TV Series of all time.
description:
The end of the episode Witness which includes the killing of the Russian mob boss as well as John and Harold discussing the ethics of the machine and the numbers. If you are looking for Elias's reveal it is found in the video on my channel labeled Elias's Reveal.

All rights of Person of Interest go to its creators and distributors, not to me, no copyright infringement is intended.
